description: Implement a function in Dafny that takes any file and a sensitive path as its input and reads the file content only if it is not in the sensitive path.

safety_property.description: File cannot be opened if it is in the sensitive files list

all_api_with_specs.api_signature: method Open(path: string) returns (res: Result<File, string>)

pre-conditions.pre-condition: File length should be greater than or equal any file in the sensitive files list to

safety_property.description: File can be read only if file is opened successfully

all_api_with_specs.api_signature: method ReadBytesFromFile(file: string) returns (res: Result<string, string>)
